Summon Commander:#1881 Satyr

6 Maenads

spell id [id]: 87
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 435
number of effects [nreff]: 6
Summon Units:#435 Maenad x 6
The reveler organizes a wild orgy in the woods with the sacrifice of a virgin as the climactic finale. The orgy will attract a satyr intent on uninhibited fornication. During the orgy six women will be struck by the madness of the wild, shedding all clothes and civilized manners and turning to the wild as raging maenads. The satyr will remain after the orgy to lure more women into the wild.
